Package draw

Class Summary
Algorithm This class is responsible for all use of the shortest path algorithm
CoordinateSystem Class used for adjust coordinate system used for drawing Makes it possible to scale coordinates system and move origo Also flips y-axis, since draw method increase downward, while "normal" coordinate system increase upwards.
Matrix Model used for representing a 2x2 matrix.
TaxiMap Class used for drawing the taxi map all roads and intersections are drawed.
TaxiMapCanvas JPanel canvas used for drawing map
TaxiMenu Class for drawing the taxi menu Draws the triplist menu Colour codes are used as indicater Thick line is indicating which trip is currently selected
TaxiMenuCanvas JPanel canvas used for drawing manue
Vector Model used for representing a vector with a length of 2.
